name: site-formations
description: Site vitrine moderne pour prÃ©senter formations et services
author: Votre Nom

scripts.img:avif: mkdir -p src/assets/img_opt src/assets/img_raw && { ls src/assets/img_raw/*.png src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm exec sharp -i src/assets/img_raw/*.png -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg -o src/assets/img_opt/{name}.avif -f avif -q 75 resize 1500 || echo "No raw images to convert (avif)"; }
scripts.img:webp: mkdir -p src/assets/img_opt src/assets/img_raw && { ls src/assets/img_raw/*.png src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm exec sharp -i src/assets/img_raw/*.png -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg -o src/assets/img_opt/{name}.webp -f webp -q 75 resize 1500 || echo "No raw images to convert (webp)"; }
scripts.img:png: mkdir -p src/assets/img_opt src/assets/img_raw && { ls src/assets/img_raw/*.png src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm exec sharp -i src/assets/img_raw/*.png -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpg -i src/assets/img_raw/*.jpeg -o src/assets/img_opt/{name}.png  -f png  -q 80 resize 1500 || echo "No raw images to convert (png)"; }
scripts.img:opt: pnpm run img:avif && pnpm run img:webp && pnpm run img:png
scripts.build: pnpm run img:opt && astro check && astro build
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.cf:preview: pnpm build && pnpm dlx wrangler dev
scripts.cf:deploy: pnpm build && pnpm dlx wrangler deploy
